entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having his hand sliced open every night.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts, mentioned as being strict and taking points off Gryffindor.

entities.name: miss johnson
entities.description: The team captain of the Quidditch pitch, mentioned as having shouting matches with Harry Potter.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: A student who gave Harry a look of disgust and stalked away.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as sympathizing with him.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as reading the Daily Prophet and not saying anything.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: A person whose picture is obscuring Hermione's face.

entities.name: hogwarts high inquisitor
entities.description: The position held by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts that lost points due to Harry's behavior.

entities.name: quidditch pitch
entities.description: The location where Miss Johnson has shouting matches with Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall took points off Gryffindor because of Harry's behavior.
Harry was disapproved by Professor McGonagall for his behavior.
